This game has gotten worse over time with the game becoming free. Non-prime competitive is unplayable, you will literally find a hacker almost every game. The best part about non-prime is trying to hit level 21 to become prime. Even then, you'll still find hackers, or you have a bad trust factor. Low trust factor = toxic teammates, hackers, smurfs, any account that has a lot of reports = low trust factor. This game is getting worse and Valve is adding a Riot Shield.
Really good competitive environment in this game woth a try.

with only 100 hours i cant say mush but there are LOTS of hackers in non-prime and prime just has legit hackers. But if you play something like facit or ESEA it solves that problem and the game is fun.
This game is a good game.
Great game to play with friends
It's a great game when it comes to gun play and tactics. It has a few issues such as hacking and smurfing, but past that a fun free game for casuals and pros alike.
The holy trinity: The M4A1-S, The AK47, and the Desert Eagle. You master these and you have competitive in the bag.
Its very fun, but it can sometimes be very toxic but for the most part, it is mostly fun. 100% would recommend!
este juego es entretenido cada vez te da ganas de seguir y de seguir jugando lo mejor es que es gratis haci que descargalo
This game is an absoulute classic and is one of if not the best FPS game ever. Practice is rewarding, games are fun, and winning is based on your performance no RNG required.
